Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurring before any rejection activity (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled' without any intermediate rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of variants in which 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' appears without being followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' instances that are followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' and do not result in a rejection by any role
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants that complete successfully (i.e., end with 'Payment Handled') compared to its frequency in variants that include at least one rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurrences that are part of the most frequent variant pattern (top 3 variants by frequency)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is directly followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' versus being directly followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that avoid re-submission loops (i.e., no subsequent 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' followed by another 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases with total amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of all process executions where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs, relative to the total number of activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' followed by a rejection (by any approver) to variants where it leads directly to final approval or payment
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' appears in cases that eventually include 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', even if not directly preceded by it
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' as the sole intermediate approval step (i.e., not followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' or 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER') in successful cases
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' does not occur

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' events that occur in 2018 (university-wide data) versus 2017 (two departments only), to assess scalability impact on approval quality
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases
